directions: Combine first 6 ingredients in large bowl. Mix in pasta. Add dressing and dill and blend well. Season salad to taste with salt and pepper. (Salad can be prepared 2 hours ahead. Cover and refrigerate.) Adjust salad with more dressing if desired and serve.
ingredients: 4 ounces (about 1 cup) small shell pasta, freshly cooked
6 tablespoons (or more) prepared ranch-style salad dressing
3 tablespoons chopped fresh dill or 1 tablespoon dried dillweed
title: Garden Tuna Salad
